style.Color:: Gun Metal Frame with Polarized Smoke Lens

reviewText: The lenses are great but the rubber sleeves that fit on the nose bridge fell out in a couple of days and I can't locate them - that's how easy they fell out.  They're still usable but not comfortable - the manufacturer should apply an adhesive to keep them in place.  I cannot find replacement rubber sleeves either.
summary: The lenses are great but the rubber sleeves that fit on the nose ...
